abstract: Stephen Holden reviews performance Visible Phoenix by singer Carolyn Montgomery-Forant, accompanied by pop-jazz ensemble led by pianist Jon Weber, at Laurie Beechman Theater.
lead_paragraph: Carolyn Montgomery-Forant’s new show, “Visible Phoenix,” continues through June 12 at the Laurie Beechman Theater at the West Bank Cafe.

headline.main: Review: Carolyn Montgomery-Forant, Back on the Cabaret Stage With Stories and Laughter
headline.print_headline: A Party Vibe With Songs and Laughs

snippet: Carolyn Montgomery-Forant’s new show, “Visible Phoenix,” continues through June 12 at the Laurie Beechman Theater at the West Bank Cafe.
